## Component Status

### ‚úÖ Completed & Tested
1. **Core UI/UX**
   - Dashboard layout and responsive design
   - Class, student, and gradebook screens
   - Tool tabs with horizontal scrolling
   - Mobile-friendly interface

2. **Grade Management**
   - Score editing with quick grade interface
   - Undo functionality
   - Grade calculations
   - Category weighting

3. **Data Import**
   - CSV parsing with UTF-8 BOM support
   - File type detection (Calendar vs Roster)
   - Column name fuzzy matching
   - Error diagnostics and user guidance

4. **Export**
   - Grade export to CSV format
   - Download functionality with 1-second delay
   - Multi-format support (CSV, XLSX, PDF)

5. **Database**
   - Firebase Firestore schema optimized
   - Indexes created and deployed
   - Security rules in place
   - Backup strategy in place

6. **Testing**
   - 10 E2E tests passing
   - Playwright automation ready
   - Manual testing guide provided
   - Coverage: login, navigation, editing, export, import

### üü° Partially Tested
1. **File Uploads**
   - CSV parsing: ‚úÖ Tested
   - XLSX parsing: ‚úÖ Tested
   - File picker UI: ‚ö†Ô∏è Limited testing
   - Real file upload in E2E: ‚ö†Ô∏è Not fully automated

2. **Google Sign-In**
   - Firebase config: ‚úÖ In place
   - Authorized domains: ‚ö†Ô∏è Needs verification
   - OAuth flow: ‚ö†Ô∏è Not manually tested

3. **AI Features**
   - Code integration: ‚úÖ Complete
   - API configuration: ‚úÖ In place
   - Error handling: ‚úÖ Implemented
   - Actual API calls: ‚ö†Ô∏è Never tested (no valid key)

### üî¥ Not Yet Tested / Verified

## AI Integration Status

### Implementation Status: ‚úÖ 100% Complete
- [x] Student Import AI integrated
- [x] Class Import AI integrated
- [x] Exam Scores AI integrated
- [x] Calendar Import AI integrated
- [x] Error handling implemented
- [x] Loading dialogs implemented

### Configuration Status: ‚ö†Ô∏è Awaiting User
- API Key: **NOT SET** (needs to be set by user)
- Endpoint: **SET** (https://api.openai.com/v1)
- Validation: **IN PLACE** (app checks on startup)

### How to Enable AI Features
```powershell
# Set environment variable
Set-Item -Path Env:OPENAI_PROXY_API_KEY -Value "sk-your-key-here"

# Run with AI
flutter run -d chrome
```

### Testing AI Features
See Section 5 in [MANUAL_TESTING_GUIDE.md](MANUAL_TESTING_GUIDE.md)

---

## Known Limitations

1. **Web-Only**: No native mobile build (Flutter Web only)
2. **AI Optional**: Features work without OpenAI API
3. **Local Fallback**: AI failures fall back to local parsing
4. **Single-User**: No real-time multi-user collaboration
5. **Browser Storage**: Data persists in Firestore only

---

## Sign-Off & Next Steps

### Immediate Next Steps
1. **User to Set Up API Key** (if using AI)

   - Set as environment variable
   - Test AI features

2. **Run Full Manual Testing**
   - Follow MANUAL_TESTING_GUIDE.md
   - Document any issues
   - Prioritize blockers

3. **Verify Google Sign-In**
   - Test real Google OAuth flow
   - Check Firebase console settings
   - Document any issues

4. **Performance Baseline**
   - Measure load times
   - Establish monitoring alerts
   - Document baseline

### Go/No-Go Decision Criteria

**GO (Deploy to Production)** if:
- ‚úÖ All manual tests passing
- ‚úÖ No critical bugs found
- ‚úÖ Google Sign-In working
- ‚úÖ Performance acceptable
- ‚úÖ Documentation complete

**NO-GO (Fix Issues First)** if:
- ‚ùå Failing tests on critical features
- ‚ùå Security issues found
- ‚ùå Performance unacceptable
- ‚ùå Untested features discovered
